alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 8:28AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Grant, southwestern Faulkner, northeastern Garland, Saline, northeastern Hot Spring and Pulaski Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 827 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Little Italy to 6 miles southeast of Williams Junction to 7 miles northeast of Hot Springs Village. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... Sherwood... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Hot Springs Village... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Southwest Little Rock... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Rockport... Traskwood... Tull... Perla... Lonsdale... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 100 and 142. Interstate 40 between mile markers 139 and 161. Interstate 430 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 630 between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 440 between mile markers 1 and 11. US Highway 67 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Faulkner; Garland; Grant; Hot Spring; Pulaski; Saline
